job_tasks.phrase: improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation' directly relates to the operational aspect of managing and enhancing systems, which aligns with automation efforts in MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the creation and development of new software systems and platforms, which is a core component of software development.
Enhancing existing infrastructure involves modifications and improvements to current systems, falling under the umbrella of software development and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: infra delivery to our internal customers
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the operational process of delivering infrastructure services to users, which is part of the operational lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software
job_tasks.justification: Life cycle management of systems and software encompasses all operational aspects from deployment to maintenance and retirement, aligning with MLOps principles.

soft_skills.phrase: you have to take initiative yourself. Be enthusiastic, do you miss something or do you see improvement? Go ahead, change it!
For us is learning the same as calling. You are responsible for your own development, so you decide how, what and when you develop yourself!
You make sure that your manager and your colleagues know your goals and development requests.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on infrastructure improvement, automation, and life cycle management within a Linux team. It lacks any mention of AI, machine learning, or specific generative AI techniques, making it unsuitable for an AI-focused role.
